DataElement.preferredName: Planned Surgery Neoadjuvant Therapy CTMS Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Particular day specified when a surgical procedure is planned to occur._Treatment given as a first step to shrink a tumor before the main treatment, which is usually surgery, is given. Examples of neoadjuvant therapy include chemotherapy, radiation therapy, and hormone therapy. It is a type of induction therapy._Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Particular day specified when a surgical procedure is planned to occur._Treatment given as a first step to shrink a tumor before the main treatment, which is usually surgery, is given. Examples of neoadjuvant therapy include chemotherapy, radiation therapy, and hormone therapy. It is a type of induction therapy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: To devise, contrive, or form in design.:The administration of therapeutic agents prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment more effective.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Concepts.definition: To devise, contrive, or form in design.
Therapy administered prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment more effective.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event will happen or has happened.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

ReferenceDocuments.name: If Neoadjuvant, Date of arran
ReferenceDocuments.description: If Neoadjuvant, Date of arranged surgery
